snippet.title: Sonic: Edge of Darkness - SAGE 2014 Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Good day everyone! Delta and I, SuperBliz, are proud to present our upcoming project's appearance at this year's SAGE. We hope to hear any criticism you guys may have and would like to listen to it.

Our thread on SFGHQ:
http://sonicunited.org/forums/index.php?/topic/6636-the-sonic-edge-of-darkness-thread/

Our thread on Sonic Retro:
http://forums.sonicretro.org/index.php?showtopic=29362

Website:
http://sonicedgeofdarkness.weebly.com/

SAGE 2014 Act 1 Booth:
http://sagexpo.org/games/sonic-edge-of-darkness/
